name: Double Travel
description:
HI there! 

The game is all about rewinding the character between two timelines. Your goal is to complete the level by advancing onto another one through doors. Unfortunately, me and my friends were only able to make two levels(one of them is tutorial), but I hope you at least like the idea. This is our first bigger project and we are proud of what we have achieved. 

This game jam gave us a lot of experience and we hope, that this is only the start of our journey. Feel free to give us any feedback about our game and most importantly have fun! :)

Game Design / Logic - Martin Kuczyński/ Michał Bałasz

Pixel Art / Graphics - Mateusz Skop

Sounds / Graphics - Michał Bałasz
